::KitKat:;

She walked into the mess hall, and walked up to the food replicator.  
She sighed and looked at the food list.  Nothing really looked good, 
but she was hungry.  She picked a small energon cube and decided a 
quick recharge was better than really enjoying a meal.  She got a 
glass of water and sat down at a table near the door.  She looked at 
her glass and stared at the water in it.  She was thinking about how 
the clone was made.  Could she make her own clone? COuld she clone 
other warriors?  She saw the advantage that clones offered.  But 
then, she knew that one day, one clone would exceed it's programs and 
take over.  The thought of clones running the world made her shiver, 
as the cold chill of fear ran up her back.  She had the distinct 
thought that what ever was going to happen, she couldn't let Megatron 
get away with making clones.
